quotes.quote: The souls of both were knit together without sewing
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: We should never cease to learn
quotes.author: Carlo Ancelotti

quotes.quote: Until you can make the unconscious conscious it will rule your life and you'll call it fate
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Verbs are greater than nouns at describing people
quotes.author: Vaudine England

quotes.quote: If you don't take a step you can't put a foot wrong
quotes.author: Conor Kennedy

quotes.quote: If you don't stand for something you'll fall for anything
quotes.author: Lenny Henry

quotes.quote: Until the lion learns to write the narrative will always favour the hunter
quotes.author: Unknown (African proverb)

quotes.quote: The social needs of a community should inform it's economic agenda
quotes.author: George the Poet

quotes.quote: There is no greater mistake then trying to make charity do the work of justice
quotes.author: William Desert Tuckeron

quotes.quote: In a Time of Universal Deceit — Telling the Truth Is a Revolutionary Act
quotes.author: George Orwell / Musa Messi

quotes.quote: People hate because if people had to stop hating they'd have to deal with pain
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: To achieve equality you don't change mindsets you change process
quotes.author: Sarah Gordon, CEO impact investing

quotes.quote: I think it's deeply important to be ashamed of your countries history otherwise what progress can we strive for
quotes.author: CK

quotes.quote: The function of an artist is to make people like life better than before
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: The only proof he needed for the existence of God was music
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Without music the melancoly silence is deafening
quotes.author: CK

quotes.quote: It's the quest to get open and free
quotes.author: Rap Ferreira

quotes.quote: Give it to whoever or whatever you thought was god
quotes.author: Wiki

quotes.quote: Books are different. I often look for books that are like medicine, that fit my situation and my thoughts, and I read them over and over again until the pages are tattered, underlining everything and still the book will have something to give me. Books never tire of me.
quotes.author: Baek Se-hee
quotes.source: I Want to Die But I Want to Eat Tteokpokki

quotes.quote: If he'd read a different book at a different time in his life he'd be a different man
quotes.author: Luther

quotes.quote: My philosophy is that you need, year-on-year, new voices, new profiles, just to stimulate the group. Just to keep the group competitive, to keep the group's daily training at its maximum
quotes.author: Unknown English coach

quotes.quote: My type of loyalty probably doesn't exist any more. Maybe the dinosaur I became was the last symbol of times that have changed.
quotes.author: Arsène Wenger

quotes.quote: That war only made billionaire out of millionaires. Today's war is making triollionairs out of billionaire. Now that's what I call progress
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: The blues can't drive depression clear out of a house, but can drive it into the corners of any room where it's being playing
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: I keep hoping the damn things will kill me, a fire at one end a fool at the other
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: We have squandered our planets resources, including air and water, as though there was no tomorrow, so now there isn't going to be
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: By quarreling among themselves, only succeeded in hiding their ignorance from one another
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: I felt like what I had been standing on had collapsed and that I had nothing else under my feet, what I had lived on no longer existed and there was nothing left
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: I feel bad for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: I cook with wine, sometimes I even add it to the food
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Here's to alcohol, the cause of, and solution to, all life's problems
quotes.author: The Simpsons

quotes.quote: Do you drink? Of course, I just said I was a writer
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: You can learn a lot about a woman by getting smashed with her
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: Candy is dandy, but liquor is quicker
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: There's nothing worse then the lies we don't truly live in
quotes.author: CK

quotes.quote: There's nothing like her company to elucidate life
quotes.author: CK

quotes.quote: Morality exists between the margins of what you know you should do and what you want to do
quotes.author: CK

quotes.quote: The thing I hate most in life is cynacyism. You work really hard and are kind, amazing things will happen
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: In a world like this all we have is our ability to emphasise
quotes.author: Michael McCreary

quotes.quote: If you don't have debate and discussion you can not form an opinion
quotes.author: Skin (Skunk Anansie)

quotes.quote: We are not all having the same debate at the same time, its very arrogant to tear people down for not being there yet
quotes.author: Skin (Skunk Anansie)

quotes.quote: Blame is a person seeking missile
quotes.author: Michael Bavidge

quotes.quote: Sometimes tethers are beyond repair
quotes.author: Conor

quotes.quote: That's either a myth or the truth
quotes.author: Jackson Bailey

quotes.quote: Too many grownups tend to put themselves into little rooms with windows that don't open
quotes.author: Madeleine L'Engle

quotes.quote: If dogs could talk, perhaps we would find it as hard to get along with them as we do people
quotes.author: Karel Capek

quotes.quote: I don't play video games the same way I don't try crack
quotes.author: Zoe Balotta

quotes.quote: When jazz first came out, the older cats thought it was too wild and wouldn't last. When rap came out, the older heads said it wasn't gonna last. Being caught in the past is the most frightening thing I could possibly imagine
quotes.author: Shabazz Palaces frontman (Butler)

quotes.quote: I wish I had the cash to make my vices problems
quotes.author: Saint Melaa

quotes.quote: Exile is no place for a person, or your compassion
quotes.author: Rap Ferreira

quotes.quote: Over time, injury becomes a state of mind for the sidelined footballer. The first thing you lose is the capacity to be hopeful
quotes.author: McGrath

quotes.quote: If everybody did not die the earth would be all covered over and I, as I, could not have come to be
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: How can you wake up with someone you don't love and not be slightly fazed by it
quotes.author: Arctic Monkeys

quotes.quote: Whiteness is a phenomenon unthinkable in a context where white does not equal power at some structural level
quotes.author: Charles Mills

quotes.quote: A master is made by his whip
quotes.author: Monster Florence

quotes.quote: The long and the short if it is that the master makes himself a slave to his slave by needing that domination to define him
quotes.author: Akala

quotes.quote: As long as whiteness is a metaphor for power, blackness must of course function as a metaphor for powerlessness, and as long as money whitens, poverty must blacken
quotes.author: Akala

quotes.quote: White supremacists, as much as they don't want to admit it, make themselves slaves to black excellence when they allow its existence to unbalance their entire sense of self
quotes.author: Akala

quotes.quote: Power concedes nothing without demand or motive, and the abolitionist movement needs to be viewed much like the anti-war movements of today
quotes.author: Akala

quotes.quote: Too scared of hope to hope, too experienced to experience, too close to dead is what I think
quotes.author: Claudia Rankine

quotes.quote: My dark skin saved my dad from child services but no one saved me
quotes.author: Derek Owusu

quotes.quote: As a child, I wished the colours of his kente would soak into him and give me a father whose personality was luminous; instead he'd pass on darkness to my eyes
quotes.author: Derek Owusu

quotes.quote: She needs a man and I'm a boy; she wants to make love and I want to be in love
quotes.author: Derek Owusu

quotes.quote: Who taught you to hate yourself?
quotes.author: Derek Owusu's therapist

quotes.quote: The small amount of emotion in her voice was loud enough to scare me away. I couldn't burden my therapist or know I had the power to - so, therapist, I unburden you
quotes.author: Derek Owusu

quotes.quote: There are some people that you shouldn't see cry
quotes.author: Derek Owusu

quotes.quote: They think they're going to lose already; let's not disappoint them
quotes.author: Ray Parlour

quotes.quote: From men, I learnt to praise the thickness of walls. From women I learned to praise
quotes.author: Ocean Vuong

quotes.quote: Some grenades explode with a vision of white flowers
quotes.author: Ocean Vuong

quotes.quote: But books are different. I often look for books that are like medicine, that fit my situation and my thoughts, and I read them over and over again until the pages are tattered, underlining everything and still the book will have something to give me. Books never tire of me. And in time they present a solution, quietly waiting until I am fully healed. That's one of the nicest things about books.
quotes.author: Baek Se-hee
quotes.book: I Want to Die But I Want to Eat Tteokpokki

quotes.quote:
What you're trying to say is that it's easier for you to hide in your own darkness, than emerge cloaked in your own vulnerability. Not better, but easier. However the longer you hold it in, the more likely you are to suffocate.
At some point, you must breathe.
quotes.author: Caleb Azumah Nelson

quotes.quote: What is better than believing you are heading towards love?
quotes.author: Caleb Azumah Nelson
quotes.html:
“What is better than believing you are heading towards love?”
― Caleb Azumah Nelson, Open Water

quotes.quote: There was an inevitability about the road towards each other which encouraged meandering along the route.
quotes.author: Zadie Smith

quotes.quote: don't aim at success. The more you aim at it and make it a target, the more you are going to miss it. For success, like happiness, cannot be pursued; it must ensue, and it only does so as the unintended side effect of one's personal dedication to a cause greater than oneself or as the by-product of one's surrender to a person other than oneself. Happiness must happen, and the same holds for success: you have to let it happen by not caring about it. I want you to listen to what your conscience commands you to do and go on to carry it out to the best of your knowledge. Then you will live to see that in the long-run—in the long-run, I say!—success will follow you precisely because you had forgotten to think about it
quotes.author: Viktor E. Frankl

quotes.quote:
I don't like people who like me because I'm a Negro; neither do I like people who find in the same accident grounds for contempt. I love America more than any other country in the world, and, exactly for this reason, I insist on the right to criticize her perpetually. I think all theories are suspect, that the finest principles may have to be modified, or may even be pulverized by the demands of life, and that one must find, therefore, one's own moral center and move through the world hoping that this center will guide one aright. I consider that I have many responsibilities, but none greater than this: to last, as Hemingway says, and get my work done.
I want to be an honest man and a good writer.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: If my children are not better than me then as a father I believe I have failed.
quotes.author: Femi Kuti
